description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Christmas Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.5 cup icing sugar, sifted (save 1 1/2 cups icing sugar, sifted)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Beat butter and vanilla together until pale and creamy. Gradually add icing sugar and beat until combined. Stir in milk. Sift flours together and mix into butter mixture until smooth.
Knead gently on a lightly floured surface until smooth. Wrap in plastic and chill for 20 minutes.

Roll out on a lightly floured surface until 4mm thick. Using cutters (star, tree or fluted round), cut out biscuits and transfer to trays. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden. Allow to cool completely.
Lightly whisk egg white with lemon juice in a bowl. Gradually add icing sugar, stirring until smooth and combined. Decorate biscuits with dots of icing mixture.
